data_description.operation_mode: Choose Live to connect to Formula 1 SignalR, or Development to replay a saved dump locally.
data_description.replay_file: Absolute path to a recorded SignalR dump file. Only required in Development mode.
data_description.enable_race_control: Ansluter till Formula 1 Live Timing API för att ta emot liveuppdateringar. Om avaktiverad skapas inte dessa livesensorer.

data_description.replay_file: Absolute path to a recorded SignalR dump file. Only required in Development mode.
data_description.enable_race_control: Ansluter till Formula 1 Live Timing API för att ta emot liveuppdateringar. Om avaktiverad skapas inte dessa livesensorer.

error.replay_required: Select a replay dump file when Development mode is enabled.
error.replay_missing: Replay dump file not found or unreadable.
